course_info.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
course_info.description: A comprehensive exploration of common data structures and algorithms with practical applications.

topics.name: Sorting Algorithms
topics.description: Methods for ordering collections of data

weeks.title: Introduction to Data Structures
weeks.description: Overview of basic data structures and their applications

weeks.title: Arrays and Linked Lists
weeks.description: Implementation and comparison of arrays and linked lists

weeks.title: Trees and Recursion
weeks.description: Hierarchical data structures and recursive algorithms

lectures.transcript: In this lecture, we introduce the fundamental concepts of algorithm analysis...

lectures.title: Array Operations and Applications
lectures.transcript: Arrays are fundamental data structures with constant-time access...

lectures.title: Binary Search Trees
lectures.transcript: Binary search trees combine the flexibility of linked structures with efficient searching...
